Review Text: Felt like home away from home. The services was a top notch, all I had to do all day and I was taken care of. If I had my way, I would rather spend my money and resources there than in a cheap hotel. One of a kind

Excelente atención y servicio del capitán Marini, Wendy, y también los meseros Carlos Nicolás, Juan Morones, Chel y Amelia, en el hotel Hard Rock de Can Cun, d finitivamente vamos a regresar y cuando volvamos esperamos ser atendidos por ellos, atentamente familia Rivera.

A praia que serve este hotel tem a parte do mar mais bonito de Cancun . E um sistema all inclusive que te tras uma tranquilodade para beber e comer durante sua estadia . Os quartos novos , padrao HardRock ,nao tem erro nunca .

Excellent Service, friendly and happy people attending.  Excellent food, all restaurants are delicious. Party all the time, good music and Disco bar.  Service is incredible!  Room service 24/7 pretty good.  Tip:  pizza restaurant open the whole night is perfect for after party

We love Hard Rocks.   The one in Venice is no exception.   The arugula chicken salad is delicious. Service is good and efficient.   Beer and wine are also great.   Of course there is also the music.  It us quite conveniently located close to St Mark's square.

Review Title: Las mejores vacaciones de nuestras vidas pasando con personas geniales
Review Text: No se puede pedir nada más un servicio de primera no se puede pasar mal en un lugar asi SCARLEN CONCIERGE da una atención extraordinaria debería ser nombrada la empleada del año JUAN brinda un servicio de primera a cualquier petición

Funny you would contact me today for a new review as I sit pool side at the Hollywood florida hard rock hotel and casino. This place is it. It's all good, there facilities are top notch thru and thru. The food is amazing no matter which restaurant you choose and there are plenty of them. I love to gamble and there casino is the best there is and I've been to a lot of them. Everything here is first class and they've skimped on nothing. You have to try this place , trust me
